fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.source

Class AbstractProjectsListMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • fr.fastconnect.factory.tibco.bw.maven.source.AbstractProjectsListMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExistingBWProjectsListMojo, MavenProjectsListMojo

    public abstract class AbstractProjectsListMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

    This is the base class to define a list of projects. The list will be populating according to several criteria such as workspaceRoot (directory where to look for the projects) or the type of project defined by concrete children classes of inner-class AbstractProjectsListMojo.AbstractProject.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AbstractProjectsListMojo.AbstractProject
      A project can be either: an existing Maven project defined by a POM an existing BW project that is to be mavenized (Maven properties such as groupId, artifactId & version will be guessed from provided values) Concrete inner-classes will define the properties according to these profiles.

      • getRelativePath

        public static java.lang.String getRelativePath(java.lang.String targetPath,
                                               java.lang.String basePath,
                                               java.lang.String pathSeparator)

        Get the relative path from one file to another, specifying the directory separator. If one of the provided resources does not exist, it is assumed to be a file unless it ends with '/' or '\'.

        Parameters:
        targetPath - targetPath is calculated to this file
        basePath - basePath is calculated from this file
        pathSeparator - directory separator. The platform default is not assumed so that we can test Unix behaviour when running on Windows (for example)
        Returns:
